DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim determine effect HP diet CVD risk factor among overweight obese child .
DOC.brief_title: Effect High Protein Diet Cardiovascular Diseases Risk Factors Among Overweight Obese Children
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Studies regard effect high protein ( HP ) diet cardiovascular ( CVD ) risk factor report contradictory result . Objective : In present study , investigator aim determine effect HP diet CVD risk factor among overweight obese child . Design : In randomize controlled trial , investigator recruit 50 overweight obese woman , age 6-11years HP control energy restrict diet 10 week ( protein , carbohydrate , fat : 25 % , 45 % , 30 % vs. 15 % , 55 % , 30 % , respectively ) . Total protein amount , divide animal plant source 50 % -50 % animal source distribute ( half/half ) meats dairy product . Fasting blood sample , lipid profile , systolic diastolic blood pressure anthropometric measurement measure base standard guideline .
DOC.criteria: BMI > 85th age 611 year history chronic diseases take medication prescribe diet mental retardation
